data.name: EaseUS Todo Backup Home
data.detailed_description:
Full-featured Backup Solution

Create backups to prevent fatal data loss and system crash on PC & Laptop. Fast disk/partition clone lets you easily upgrade a small, old or bad hard drive without reinstalling Windows or installed programs and games.
data.about_the_game:
Full-featured Backup Solution

Create backups to prevent fatal data loss and system crash on PC & Laptop. Fast disk/partition clone lets you easily upgrade a small, old or bad hard drive without reinstalling Windows or installed programs and games.
data.short_description: EaseUS Todo Backup Home is the data backup software that can backup files & folders, systems, and important data for Windows desktops & Laptops.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
data.reviews:
“Selective, automatic, and easy. EaseUS’s solution to backup is probably the most sensible we’ve seen.”
PCGAMER

“My current favorite is EaseUS Todo Backup. The free version is more configurable and thus more powerful than File History. The paid one is even better.”
PCWorld

“Instead, you're going to need to clone your drive, using a program such as EaseUS Todo Backup, which has a free version for Windows or a paid version with a free trial for macOS users.”
tom‘s guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
